SELECT oi.id, oi.CODE, oi.plan_id, oi.materials_code, oi.total_price, oi.purchase_num, oi.supplier_id, oi.STATUS, oi.audit_user, oi.pass_rate, oi.content, oi.images, oi.del_flag, oi.create_date,
si.CODE AS supplierCode, si.NAME AS supplierName, si.charge_person, si.phone, si.images AS supplierImages,
mi.NAME AS materialsName, mi.model, mi.images AS materialsImages, mi.type, mi.measurement_unit,
ppi.purchase_num FROM order_info oi LEFT JOIN supplier_info si ON (si.id = oi.supplier_id) LEFT JOIN materials_info mi ON (mi.CODE = oi.materials_code) LEFT JOIN purchase_plan_info ppi ON (ppi.id = oi.plan_id) WHERE 1 = 1 AND oi.del_flag = 0
AND si.name like CONCAT("%",#{queryForm.supplierName},"%")
AND oi.code like CONCAT("%",#{queryForm.orderCode},"%")
AND oi.STATUS = #{queryForm.status}
AND mi.NAME like CONCAT("%",#{queryForm.materialsName},"%")
AND si.sys_user_id = #{queryForm.supplierUserId}
ORDER BY oi.create_date DESC

SELECT oi.id, oi.CODE, oi.plan_id, oi.materials_code, oi.total_price, oi.purchase_num, oi.supplier_id, oi.STATUS, oi.audit_user, oi.pass_rate, oi.content, oi.images, oi.del_flag, oi.create_date,
si.CODE AS supplierCode, si.NAME AS supplierName, si.charge_person, si.phone, si.images AS supplierImages,
mi.NAME AS materialsName, mi.model, mi.images AS materialsImages, mi.type, mi.measurement_unit,
ppi.purchase_num FROM order_info oi LEFT JOIN supplier_info si ON (si.id = oi.supplier_id) LEFT JOIN materials_info mi ON (mi.CODE = oi.materials_code) LEFT JOIN purchase_plan_info ppi ON (ppi.id = oi.plan_id) WHERE 1 = 1 AND oi.del_flag = 0 AND si.sys_user_id = #{supplierId} ORDER BY oi.create_date DESC
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(oi.total_price), 0) FROM order_info oi where 1 = 1 AND oi.del_flag = 0

SELECT mi.type AS typeName, SUM(oi.total_price) AS totalPrice, SUM(oi.purchase_num) AS totalNum FROM order_info oi LEFT JOIN materials_info mi ON (mi.`code` = oi.materials_code) WHERE 1 = 1 AND oi.del_flag = 0 GROUP BY mi.type

select oi.id, oi.CODE, oi.plan_id, oi.materials_code, oi.total_price, oi.purchase_num, oi.supplier_id, oi.STATUS, oi.audit_user, oi.pass_rate, oi.content, oi.images, oi.del_flag, oi.create_date from order_info oi where DATE_FORMAT(oi.create_date, '%Y%m') = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE(), '%Y%m') AND oi.del_flag = 0
